document.full_text: sharp corp has suspended production at two japanese liquid crystal display (lcd) panel plants until early may as it confronts slumping domestic demand for televisions and shortages of a gas used in panel production, the company said on monday.
document.title: sharp suspends two tv panel plants as demand tumbles
